alert.note: Alert for Brooke; Eastern Preston; Eastern Tucker; Hancock; Marion; Marshall; Monongalia; Ohio; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Western Tucker; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 17 at 4:14AM EST until January 17 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 4 inches through 9 AM, highest across western and northwest Pennsylvania. West wind increasing this morning 15 to 20 mph with gusts to 30 mph. Gusts to 45 mph expected across the Laurel Highlands into the mountains of northern West Virginia, leading to areas of blowing snow. * WHERE...Eastern Ohio, western Pennsylvania and northern West Virginia. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads, as well as bridges and overpasses, will remain slick and hazardous. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
